title: Add /mutepings /muteemotes
body:
/muteall only works for chat.
 pls upgrade,you have the technology
 k thx bye

replies.body: Are you being serious? Both of these are already functions.

> [{quoted}](name=Annie Lolicon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRRmNBJW,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-16T20:45:45.704+0000)
>
> Are you being serious? Both of these are already functions.

They are not for chat commands. Hes talking about chat commands and its a perfectly dandy request.

> [{quoted}](name=Q The Keg,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=YRRmNBJW,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2017-10-16T20:58:12.938+0000)
>
> They are not for chat commands. Hes talking about chat commands and its a perfectly dandy request.

Okay but how hard is it to just hit the Tab Key and click 2 things? It;s probably way faster then typing /muteallemotes and /muteallpings like he wants or something.

OK SO HE HAS TO CLICK TWICE FOR EACH PLAYER IN THE GAME? Or he can just type two commands into the chat box.

HMMMMMMMMMMMM. Lol, you can't be serious.

lol I dont really want to tell him how to do it. k thx bye

XD
